about_the_game: Listen to the Original Score for Skystrider, comprised of 9 songs (28 minutes). Fantastical, tension-building music artfully and ingeniously composed by Greg Nicolett whose work includes the  score for Potionomics. Each song heightens moments of Skystrider by helping to tell the story of ascension beyond clouds, beyond stars.

name: Skystrider Soundtrack
